alert.note: Alert for Beauregard; Vernon (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 4:56AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Beauregard and south central Vernon Parishes through 545 AM CST... At 455 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Slagle to near Fields. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... De Ridder, Rosepine, Fort Polk, Singer and Fields. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
